summary: Caught up in the bag, a porter from Roissy finds himself forcibly employed by the secret services to unmask a businessman suspected of trafficking explosives.
cast: Guillaume Canet|Géraldine Pailhas|Stephen Rea|Hippolyte Girardot|Archie Panjabi|Vincent Regan|Alexander Siddig|Jamie Harding|Hiam Abbass|Bruno Blairet|Fred Epaud|Michael Marks|Alexandre Steiger|Seb Cardinal|Tarek Khalil|Satya Dusaugey|Julien Meunier|Milanka Brooks|Tina Simmons|Gamal Badawi|Yass Hachem|Jean-Marc Bellu|Andrew Neymarc|Jean-Marc Culiersi|Sanah Sultan|Clement Boulland|Greg Engler|Chris Jameson|Yann Johnson|Jenny Rieu|Pierre-Benoist Varoclier|Christian Wolf-La'Moy
title: Espion(s)
